review: I was using a Playstation, but it stopped working due to some memory issue, I bought one of these for both of our TVs and they work great.  The fast forward process is a little weird, but I am learning to work with it.
author: Patrick Carson

review: minimal spectrum of NON-Amazon resources.  9 movies available from TCM, REALLY?
author: Valan Martini

review: It's one thing to advertise a product as to buy Fire TV and a person could wath over a 1,000.00 movie's paying $ 79.99- $ 99.99. Only to Find out you have to have a Amazon Prime account to watch some movie's and pay for others .
author: Ricky Jones

review: Excellent Product. Easy to set up.
author: Terry E.

review: Love it. Wish I had gotten it much sooner. Easy to set up and use.
author: stephen hanna

review: I got this for my son for Christmas.  He loves it.  He plugged it into his HD TV in his bedroom and now he can watch all of the things he usually has to stream on tablet or phone.
author: Linda B., Hastings
